title: Clean-tech startup EdgeGrid raises $6 million funding led by Lightrock - Economic Times
content: Clean-tech startup EdgeGrid raises $6 million funding led by Lightrock  Economic Times
description: Founded in 2020 by Sunil Talla and Prasad Yerneni, Mushtaq Ahmed, Neeraj Sansanwal and Vamsi TP, EdgeGrid is building a technology platform to enable the energy transition for last-mile customers, namely household, small businesses, commercial building owners and electric vehicle charging networks.
